- Avoid fire traps

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GAME CONSTANTS =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        // Canvas = drawing area (pixel art ke liye best)
        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        // Root node
        Group root = new Group();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // Scene
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);
        stage.setScene(scene);
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");

        // ===== DRAW BACKGROUND =====
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawGrid(gc);   // Temporary (debug ke liye)

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // dark cave color
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== GRID (DEBUG ONLY) =====
    private void drawGrid(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.setLineWidth(1);

        // Vertical lines
        for (int x = 0; x <= WIDTH; x += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(x, 0, x, HEIGHT);
        }

        // Horizontal lines
        for (int y = 0; y <= HEIGHT; y += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(0, y, WIDTH, y);
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

ğŸ“ src/main/java/Main.java

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GRID CONSTANTS =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Group root = new Group(canvas);
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        drawBackground(gc);
        drawGrid(gc); // debug only

        stage.show();
    }

    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // cave background
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    private void drawGrid(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.setLineWidth(1);

        for (int x = 0; x <= WIDTH; x += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(x, 0, x, HEIGHT);
        }
        for (int y = 0; y <= HEIGHT; y += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(0, y, WIDTH, y);
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GRID / WINDOW CONSTANTS =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP (TEMP â€“ LEVEL 1) =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "#########################",
            "#P     C         C     E#",
            "#     ######             ",
            "#          ^        #####",
            "#     ####        C      ",
            "#                        ",
            "#########################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Group root = new Group(canvas);
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        // ===== DRAW =====
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // dark cave background
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col);

                int x = col * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = row * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    drawWall(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (CAVE STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#374151"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Top highlight
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#4b5563"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);

        // Bottom shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GRID / WINDOW =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX;
    private double playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 24;
    private boolean moveLeft = false;
    private boolean moveRight = false;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "#########################",
            "#P     C         C     E#",
            "#     ######             ",
            "#          ^        #####",
            "#     ####        C      ",
            "#                        ",
            "#########################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Group root = new Group(canvas);
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        // ===== FIND PLAYER SPAWN =====
        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP (simple) =====
        new javafx.animation.AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.5;

        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#e5e7eb")); // soft light grey
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== LEVEL =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col);

                int x = col * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = row * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    drawWall(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (SOFT GREY STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#9ca3af"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Top highlight
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f9fafb"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);

        // Bottom shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER (CUTE BOX) =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {

        // Body
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc")); // almost white
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Outline
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 6, playerY + 8, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 15, playerY + 8, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== FIND PLAYER SPAWN (P) =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                if (LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col) == 'P') {
                    playerX = col * TILE_SIZE + 4;
                    playerY = row * TILE_SIZE + 4;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== WINDOW / GRID =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    public static final int COLS = 20;
    public static final int ROWS = 14;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 28;
    private boolean moveLeft, moveRight;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "####################",
            "#        ######   ##",
            "#   ######    ##    ",
            "#   #      P     ###",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #      #   #",
            "#   C   #   ####   #",
            "#       #        ###",
            "####################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Scene scene = new Scene(new Group(canvas));
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse â€“ Crystal Cave");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.8;
        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND (DARK PURPLE CAVE) =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
            gc.fillOval(
                    Math.random() * WIDTH,
                    Math.random() * HEIGHT,
                    80,
                    80
            );
        }
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') drawWall(gc, x, y);
                if (tile == 'C') drawCrystal(gc, x, y);
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (THIRD IMAGE STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base rock
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#2a1246"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Inner depth
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#160826"));
        gc.fillRect(x + 6, y + 6, TILE_SIZE - 12, TILE_SIZE - 12);

        // Top & left light
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#6d28d9"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);
        gc.fillRect(x, y, 6, TILE_SIZE);

        // Bottom & right shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
        gc.fillRect(x + TILE_SIZE - 6, y, 6, TILE_SIZE);

        // Pixel cracks
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(x + 14, y + 20, 4, 4);
        gc.fillRect(x + 30, y + 12, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== CRYSTAL (DECOR / COIN) =====
    private void drawCrystal(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#ec4899"));
        gc.fillPolygon(
                new double[]{x+24, x+36, x+24, x+12},
                new double[]{y+6,  y+24, y+42, y+24},
                4
        );
    }

    // ===== PLAYER (CUTE WHITE BOX) =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc"));
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 7, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 17, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER SPAWN =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {
                if (LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c) == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== BRICK IMAGE =====
    private Image brickImage;

    // ===== WINDOW / GRID =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    public static final int COLS = 20;
    public static final int ROWS = 14;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 28;
    private boolean moveLeft, moveRight;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "####################",
            "#        ######   ##",
            "#   ######    ##    ",
            "#   #      P     ###",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #      #   #",
            "#   C   #   ####   #",
            "#       #        ###",
            "####################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        // LOAD BRICK IMAGE
        brickImage = new Image(
                getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm()
        );

        Scene scene = new Scene(new Group(canvas));
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse â€“ Crystal Cave");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.8;
        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
            gc.fillOval(
                    Math.random() * WIDTH,
                    Math.random() * HEIGHT,
                    80,
                    80
            );
        }
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    gc.drawImage(brickImage, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                }

                if (tile == 'C') {
                    drawCrystal(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== CRYSTAL =====
    private void drawCrystal(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#ec4899"));
        gc.fillPolygon(
                new double[]{x + 24, x + 36, x + 24, x + 12},
                new double[]{y + 6, y + 24, y + 42, y + 24},
                4
        );
    }

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc"));
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 7, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 17, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER SPAWN =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {
                if (LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c) == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
        stage = primaryStage;
        showMenu();
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.show();
    }

        stage.setScene(new Scene(menu.getRoot(), 960, 672));
    }

    public void showLevelOne() {
        LevelOne levelOne = new LevelOne(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(levelOne.getRoot(), 960, 672));
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.scene.Group;

public class MenuScene {

        Label title = new Label("GRAVITY REVERSE");
        title.setLayoutX(280);
        title.setLayoutY(200);
        title.setTextFill(Color.WHITE);

        startBtn.setLayoutY(300);

    }

    public Group getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Group root = new Group();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = 960;
    private static final int HEIGHT = 672;

    private Image brick, coin, exit;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #      #  #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD IMAGES
        brick = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm());
        coin  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/coin.png").toExternalForm());
        exit  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/exit.png").toExternalForm());

        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#') gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                if (ch == 'C') gc.drawImage(coin, x, y, 32, 32);
                if (ch == 'E') gc.drawImage(exit, x, y, 48, 48);
            }
        }
    }

    public Group getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    private Stage stage;
    public static final int WIDTH = 960;
    public static final int HEIGHT = 672;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
        stage = primaryStage;
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");

        showSplash();
        stage.show();
    }

    public void showSplash() {
        SplashScreen splash = new SplashScreen(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(splash.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public void showLevelSelect() {
        LevelSelect select = new LevelSelect(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(select.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public void showLevelOne() {
        LevelOne level = new LevelOne(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(level.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

        Label title = new Label("GRAVITY REVERSE");

    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

ğŸ“„ LevelOne.java (FINAL FIXED VERSION)

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    private Image brick, coin, exit;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #      #  #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD IMAGES
        brick = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm());
        coin  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/coin.png").toExternalForm());
        exit  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/exit.png").toExternalForm());

        // GAME LOOP
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#')
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

                if (ch == 'C')
                    gc.drawImage(coin, x + 8, y + 8, 32, 32);

                if (ch == 'E')
                    gc.drawImage(exit, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
            }
        }
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    private Image brick;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#                  #",
            "#   ######         #",
            "#   #              #",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #          #",
            "#       #   ####   #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        System.out.println("LEVEL ONE (BRICK) LOADED");

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD BRICK IMAGE
        brick = new Image(
                getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm()
        );

        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        // background
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        // draw bricks
        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                if (MAP[r].charAt(c) == '#') {
                    int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                    int y = r * TILE_SIZE;
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane;
import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
import javafx.scene.control.Button;
import javafx.scene.control.Label;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.scene.text.Font;
import javafx.geometry.Pos;

public class LevelSelect {

    private StackPane root = new StackPane();

    public LevelSelect(Main app) {

        // ROOT SIZE + BG
        root.setPrefSize(Main.WIDTH, Main.HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #12091f;");
        root.setPickOnBounds(true); // ğŸ”¥ VERY IMPORTANT

        Label heading = new Label("SELECT LEVEL");
        heading.setTextFill(Color.WHITE);
        heading.setFont(Font.font("Verdana", 36));

        Button level1 = new Button("LEVEL 1");
        level1.setPrefSize(200, 60);
        level1.setFocusTraversable(false);

        // ğŸ”¥ HARD CLICK TEST
        level1.setOnMouseClicked(e -> {
            System.out.println("LEVEL 1 CLICKED");
            app.showLevelOne();
        });

        Button level2 = new Button("LEVEL 2");
        level2.setPrefSize(200, 60);
        level2.setDisable(true);

        VBox box = new VBox(30, heading, level1, level2);
        box.setAlignment(Pos.CENTER);

        root.getChildren().add(box);
    }

    public StackPane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}
âš ï¸ WHY THIS WORKS:

StackPane = safest clickable root

VBox = no overlap

setPickOnBounds(true) = mouse capture guaranteed

setOnMouseClicked = stronger than setOnAction

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    // ===== CONSTANTS =====
    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private double velocityY = 0;
    private boolean gravityDown = true;
    private static final int PLAYER_SIZE = 32;

    // ===== GAME STATE =====
    private int coinsCollected = 0;
    private int totalCoins = 0;
    private boolean gateOpen = false;

    // ===== IMAGES =====
    private Image brick, coin, spike, gateClosed, gateOpenImg, playerImg;

    // ===== MAP =====
    // # = wall
    // C = coin
    // ^ = spike
    // E = gate
    // P = player spawn
    private String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #   ^      #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");
        root.setFocusTraversable(true);

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // ===== LOAD IMAGES =====
        brick = load("brick.png");
        coin = load("coin.png");
        spike = load("spike.png");
        gateClosed = load("gate_closed.png");
        gateOpenImg = load("gate_open.png");
        playerImg = load("player.png");

        findPlayerAndCoins();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        root.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.SPACE) {
                gravityDown = !gravityDown;
                velocityY = 0;
            }
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    // ===== IMAGE LOADER =====
    private Image load(String name) {
        return new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/" + name).toExternalForm());
    }

    // ===== FIND PLAYER + COUNT COINS =====
    private void findPlayerAndCoins() {
        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {
                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                if (ch == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE;
                }
                if (ch == 'C') totalCoins++;
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        velocityY += gravityDown ? 0.6 : -0.6;
        playerY += velocityY;
    }

    // ===== DRAW =====
    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        // background
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        // map
        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#')
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

                if (ch == 'C') {
                    gc.drawImage(coin, x + 8, y + 8, 32, 32);
                    if (collide(x, y)) {
                        MAP[r] = MAP[r].substring(0, c) + ' ' + MAP[r].substring(c + 1);
                        coinsCollected++;
                        if (coinsCollected == totalCoins) gateOpen = true;
                    }
                }

                if (ch == '^') {
                    gc.drawImage(spike, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                    if (collide(x, y)) resetPlayer();
                }

                if (ch == 'E') {
                    Image gateImg = gateOpen ? gateOpenImg : gateClosed;
                    gc.drawImage(gateImg, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                    if (gateOpen && collide(x, y)) {
                        System.out.println("LEVEL COMPLETE ğŸ‰");
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        // player
        gc.drawImage(playerImg, playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // ===== BOTTOM UI =====
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#12091f"));
        gc.fillRect(0, HEIGHT - 50, WIDTH, 50);

        gc.setFill(Color.WHITE);
        gc.fillText("Coins: " + coinsCollected + "/" + totalCoins, 20, HEIGHT - 20);
        gc.fillText("PAUSE", WIDTH / 2 - 30, HEIGHT - 20);
        gc.fillText("MENU", WIDTH - 100, HEIGHT - 20);
    }

    // ===== COLLISION =====
    private boolean collide(int x, int y) {
        return Math.abs(playerX - x) < 30 && Math.abs(playerY - y) < 30;
    }

    // ===== RESET =====
    private void resetPlayer() {
        velocityY = 0;
        gravityDown = true;
        findPlayerAndCoins();
        coinsCollected = 0;
        gateOpen = false;
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.application.Platform;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    private Stage stage;

    public static final int WIDTH = 960;
    public static final int HEIGHT = 672;

    // ğŸ”¥ SPLASH STATE FLAG (IMPORTANT)
    private boolean splashActive = true;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
        stage = primaryStage;
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");

        showSplash();
        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== SPLASH =====
    public void showSplash() {
        splashActive = true;
        SplashScreen splash = new SplashScreen(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(splash.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    // ===== LEVEL SELECT =====
    public void showLevelSelect() {
        splashActive = false; // ğŸ”¥ STOP SPLASH FROM OVERRIDING
        LevelSelect select = new LevelSelect(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(select.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    // ===== LEVEL ONE =====
    public void showLevelOne() {
        Platform.runLater(() -> {
            System.out.println("SHOW LEVEL ONE CALLED");
            LevelOne level = new LevelOne(this);
            stage.setScene(new Scene(level.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
        });
    }

    // ===== SPLASH CHECK =====
    public boolean isSplashActive() {
        return splashActive;
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.PauseTransition;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.control.Label;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.scene.text.Font;
import javafx.util.Duration;

public class SplashScreen {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    public SplashScreen(Main app) {

        root.setPrefSize(Main.WIDTH, Main.HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");

        Label title = new Label("GRAVITY REVERSE");
        title.setTextFill(Color.WHITE);
        title.setFont(Font.font("Verdana", 48));
        title.setLayoutX(260);
        title.setLayoutY(300);

        root.getChildren().add(title);

        // â± SPLASH TIMER (SAFE)
        PauseTransition wait = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(5));
        wait.setOnFinished(e -> {
            if (app.isSplashActive()) {
                System.out.println("SPLASH FINISHED â†’ GO LEVEL SELECT");
                app.showLevelSelect();
            }
        });
        wait.play();
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

        }
    } else {
        // Upar wall hai?
        if (!isSolid(checkX, (int)(nextY))) {
            playerY = nextY;
        } else {
            velocityY = 0;
            // Player ko ceiling ke niche chipka do
            playerY = ((int)(playerY / TILE_SIZE) + 1) * TILE_SIZE;
        }
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    // ===== CONSTANTS =====
    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private double velocityY = 0;
    private boolean gravityDown = true;
    private static final int PLAYER_SIZE = 32;

    private boolean moveLeft = false;
    private boolean moveRight = false;

    // ===== GAME STATE =====
    private int coinsCollected = 0;
    private int totalCoins = 0;
    private boolean gateOpen = false;

    // ===== IMAGES =====
    private Image brick, coin, spike, gateClosed, gateOpenImg, playerImg;

    // ===== MAP =====
    // # = wall
    // C = coin
    // ^ = spike
    // E = gate
    // P = spawn
    private String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #   ^     #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");
        root.setFocusTraversable(true);

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // ===== LOAD IMAGES =====
        brick = load("brick.png");
        coin = load("coin.png");
        spike = load("spike.png");
        gateClosed = load("gate_closed.png");
        gateOpenImg = load("gate_open.png");
        playerImg = load("player.png");

        findPlayerAndCoins();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        root.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.LEFT) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.RIGHT) moveRight = true;

            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.UP) {
                gravityDown = false;
                velocityY = 0;
            }
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.DOWN) {
                gravityDown = true;
                velocityY = 0;
            }
        });

        root.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.LEFT) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.RIGHT) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    // ===== IMAGE LOADER =====
    private Image load(String name) {
        return new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/" + name).toExternalForm());
    }

    // ===== FIND PLAYER & COINS =====
    private void findPlayerAndCoins() {
        totalCoins = 0;
        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {
                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                if (ch == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE + 8;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE + 8;
                }
                if (ch == 'C') totalCoins++;
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {

        // Horizontal movement
        double speed = 3;
        if (moveLeft && !isSolid((int)(playerX - 2), (int)(playerY + PLAYER_SIZE / 2)))
            playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight && !isSolid((int)(playerX + PLAYER_SIZE + 2), (int)(playerY + PLAYER_SIZE / 2)))
            playerX += speed;

        // Gravity
        double gravity = gravityDown ? 1 : -1;
        velocityY += gravity * 0.5;
        double nextY = playerY + velocityY;

        int checkX = (int)(playerX + PLAYER_SIZE / 2);

        if (gravityDown) {
            if (!isSolid(checkX, (int)(nextY + PLAYER_SIZE))) {
                playerY = nextY;
            } else {
                velocityY = 0;
                playerY = ((int)((playerY + PLAYER_SIZE) / TILE_SIZE)) * TILE_SIZE - PLAYER_SIZE;
            }
        } else {
            if (!isSolid(checkX, (int)(nextY))) {
                playerY = nextY;
            } else {
                velocityY = 0;
                playerY = ((int)(playerY / TILE_SIZE) + 1) * TILE_SIZE;
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== DRAW =====
    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#')
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

                if (ch == 'C') {
                    gc.drawImage(coin, x + 10, y + 10, 28, 28);
                    if (collide(x, y)) {
                        MAP[r] = MAP[r].substring(0, c) + ' ' + MAP[r].substring(c + 1);
                        coinsCollected++;
                        if (coinsCollected == totalCoins) gateOpen = true;
                    }
                }

                if (ch == '^') {
                    gc.drawImage(spike, x + 12, y + 12, 24, 24);
                    if (collide(x, y)) resetLevel();
                }

                if (ch == 'E') {
                    Image gate = gateOpen ? gateOpenImg : gateClosed;
                    gc.drawImage(gate, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                    if (gateOpen && collide(x, y)) {
                        System.out.println("YOU WON ğŸ‰");
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        gc.drawImage(playerImg, playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // UI
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#12091f"));
        gc.fillRect(0, HEIGHT - 50, WIDTH, 50);
        gc.setFill(Color.WHITE);
        gc.fillText("Coins: " + coinsCollected + "/" + totalCoins, 20, HEIGHT - 20);
    }

    // ===== COLLISION =====
    private boolean isSolid(int px, int py) {
        int col = px / TILE_SIZE;
        int row = py / TILE_SIZE;
        if (row < 0 || row >= MAP.length || col < 0 || col >= MAP[0].length())
            return false;
        return MAP[row].charAt(col) == '#';
    }

    private boolean collide(int x, int y) {
        return Math.abs(playerX - x) < 28 && Math.abs(playerY - y) < 28;
    }

    private void resetLevel() {
        coinsCollected = 0;
        gateOpen = false;
        velocityY = 0;
        gravityDown = true;
        findPlayerAndCoins();
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

âœ” Gate open = win

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GAME CONSTANTS =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        // Canvas = drawing area (pixel art ke liye best)
        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        // Root node
        Group root = new Group();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // Scene
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);
        stage.setScene(scene);
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");

        // ===== DRAW BACKGROUND =====
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawGrid(gc);   // Temporary (debug ke liye)

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // dark cave color
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== GRID (DEBUG ONLY) =====
    private void drawGrid(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.setLineWidth(1);

        // Vertical lines
        for (int x = 0; x <= WIDTH; x += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(x, 0, x, HEIGHT);
        }

        // Horizontal lines
        for (int y = 0; y <= HEIGHT; y += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(0, y, WIDTH, y);
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        drawBackground(gc);
        drawGrid(gc); // debug only

        stage.show();
    }

    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // cave background
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    private void drawGrid(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.setLineWidth(1);

        for (int x = 0; x <= WIDTH; x += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(x, 0, x, HEIGHT);
        }
        for (int y = 0; y <= HEIGHT; y += TILE_SIZE) {
            gc.strokeLine(0, y, WIDTH, y);
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GRID / WINDOW CONSTANTS =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP (TEMP â€“ LEVEL 1) =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "#########################",
            "#P     C         C     E#",
            "#     ######             ",
            "#          ^        #####",
            "#     ####        C      ",
            "#                        ",
            "#########################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Group root = new Group(canvas);
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        // ===== DRAW =====
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b1020")); // dark cave background
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col);

                int x = col * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = row * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    drawWall(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (CAVE STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#374151"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Top highlight
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#4b5563"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);

        // Bottom shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#1f2937"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== GRID / WINDOW =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 32;
    public static final int COLS = 25;
    public static final int ROWS = 18;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX;
    private double playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 24;
    private boolean moveLeft = false;
    private boolean moveRight = false;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "#########################",
            "#P     C         C     E#",
            "#     ######             ",
            "#          ^        #####",
            "#     ####        C      ",
            "#                        ",
            "#########################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Group root = new Group(canvas);
        Scene scene = new Scene(root);

        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        // ===== FIND PLAYER SPAWN =====
        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP (simple) =====
        new javafx.animation.AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.5;

        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#e5e7eb")); // soft light grey
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
    }

    // ===== LEVEL =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col);

                int x = col * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = row * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    drawWall(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (SOFT GREY STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#9ca3af"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Top highlight
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f9fafb"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);

        // Bottom shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER (CUTE BOX) =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {

        // Body
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc")); // almost white
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Outline
        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 6, playerY + 8, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 15, playerY + 8, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== FIND PLAYER SPAWN (P) =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int row = 0; row < LEVEL_1.length; row++) {
            for (int col = 0; col < LEVEL_1[row].length(); col++) {

                if (LEVEL_1[row].charAt(col) == 'P') {
                    playerX = col * TILE_SIZE + 4;
                    playerY = row * TILE_SIZE + 4;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== WINDOW / GRID =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    public static final int COLS = 20;
    public static final int ROWS = 14;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 28;
    private boolean moveLeft, moveRight;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "####################",
            "#        ######   ##",
            "#   ######    ##    ",
            "#   #      P     ###",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #      #   #",
            "#   C   #   ####   #",
            "#       #        ###",
            "####################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        Scene scene = new Scene(new Group(canvas));
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse â€“ Crystal Cave");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.8;
        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND (DARK PURPLE CAVE) =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
            gc.fillOval(
                    Math.random() * WIDTH,
                    Math.random() * HEIGHT,
                    80,
                    80
            );
        }
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') drawWall(gc, x, y);
                if (tile == 'C') drawCrystal(gc, x, y);
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== WALL (THIRD IMAGE STYLE) =====
    private void drawWall(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {

        // Base rock
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#2a1246"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

        // Inner depth
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#160826"));
        gc.fillRect(x + 6, y + 6, TILE_SIZE - 12, TILE_SIZE - 12);

        // Top & left light
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#6d28d9"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y, TILE_SIZE, 6);
        gc.fillRect(x, y, 6, TILE_SIZE);

        // Bottom & right shadow
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        gc.fillRect(x, y + TILE_SIZE - 6, TILE_SIZE, 6);
        gc.fillRect(x + TILE_SIZE - 6, y, 6, TILE_SIZE);

        // Pixel cracks
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(x + 14, y + 20, 4, 4);
        gc.fillRect(x + 30, y + 12, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== CRYSTAL (DECOR / COIN) =====
    private void drawCrystal(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#ec4899"));
        gc.fillPolygon(
                new double[]{x+24, x+36, x+24, x+12},
                new double[]{y+6,  y+24, y+42, y+24},
                4
        );
    }

    // ===== PLAYER (CUTE WHITE BOX) =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc"));
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 7, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 17, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER SPAWN =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {
                if (LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c) == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.input.KeyCode;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.stage.Stage;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;

public class Main extends Application {

    // ===== BRICK IMAGE =====
    private Image brickImage;

    // ===== WINDOW / GRID =====
    public static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    public static final int COLS = 20;
    public static final int ROWS = 14;

    public static final int WIDTH = COLS * TILE_SIZE;
    public static final int HEIGHT = ROWS * TILE_SIZE;

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private double playerX, playerY;
    private final int PLAYER_SIZE = 28;
    private boolean moveLeft, moveRight;

    // ===== LEVEL MAP =====
    private static final String[] LEVEL_1 = {
            "####################",
            "#        ######   ##",
            "#   ######    ##    ",
            "#   #      P     ###",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #      #   #",
            "#   C   #   ####   #",
            "#       #        ###",
            "####################"
    };

    @Override
    public void start(Stage stage) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();

        // LOAD BRICK IMAGE
        brickImage = new Image(
                getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm()
        );

        Scene scene = new Scene(new Group(canvas));
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse â€“ Crystal Cave");
        stage.setScene(scene);

        findPlayerSpawn();

        // ===== INPUT =====
        scene.setOnKeyPressed(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = true;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = true;
        });

        scene.setOnKeyReleased(e -> {
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.A) moveLeft = false;
            if (e.getCode() == KeyCode.D) moveRight = false;
        });

        // ===== GAME LOOP =====
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                update();
                render(gc);
            }
        }.start();

        stage.show();
    }

    // ===== UPDATE =====
    private void update() {
        double speed = 2.8;
        if (moveLeft) playerX -= speed;
        if (moveRight) playerX += speed;
    }

    // ===== RENDER =====
    private void render(GraphicsContext gc) {
        drawBackground(gc);
        drawLevel(gc);
        drawPlayer(gc);
    }

    // ===== BACKGROUND =====
    private void drawBackground(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#05010a"));
        for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
            gc.fillOval(
                    Math.random() * WIDTH,
                    Math.random() * HEIGHT,
                    80,
                    80
            );
        }
    }

    // ===== LEVEL DRAW =====
    private void drawLevel(GraphicsContext gc) {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {

                char tile = LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (tile == '#') {
                    gc.drawImage(brickImage, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                }

                if (tile == 'C') {
                    drawCrystal(gc, x, y);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ===== CRYSTAL =====
    private void drawCrystal(GraphicsContext gc, int x, int y) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#ec4899"));
        gc.fillPolygon(
                new double[]{x + 24, x + 36, x + 24, x + 12},
                new double[]{y + 6, y + 24, y + 42, y + 24},
                4
        );
    }

    // ===== PLAYER =====
    private void drawPlayer(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#f8fafc"));
        gc.fillRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        gc.setStroke(Color.web("#6b7280"));
        gc.setLineWidth(2);
        gc.strokeRect(playerX, playerY, PLAYER_SIZE, PLAYER_SIZE);

        // Eyes ğŸ‘€
        gc.setFill(Color.BLACK);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 7, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
        gc.fillRect(playerX + 17, playerY + 9, 3, 3);
    }

    // ===== PLAYER SPAWN =====
    private void findPlayerSpawn() {
        for (int r = 0; r < LEVEL_1.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < LEVEL_1[r].length(); c++) {
                if (LEVEL_1[r].charAt(c) == 'P') {
                    playerX = c * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    playerY = r * TILE_SIZE + 10;
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    private Stage stage;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
        stage = primaryStage;
        showMenu();
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");
        stage.show();
    }

    public void showMenu() {
        MenuScene menu = new MenuScene(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(menu.getRoot(), 960, 672));
    }

    public void showLevelOne() {
        LevelOne levelOne = new LevelOne(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(levelOne.getRoot(), 960, 672));
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.control.Button;
import javafx.scene.control.Label;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.scene.text.Font;

public class MenuScene {

    private Group root = new Group();

    public MenuScene(Main app) {

        Label title = new Label("GRAVITY REVERSE");
        title.setLayoutX(280);
        title.setLayoutY(200);
        title.setTextFill(Color.WHITE);
        title.setFont(Font.font("Verdana", 48));

        Button startBtn = new Button("GET STARTED");
        startBtn.setLayoutX(400);
        startBtn.setLayoutY(300);
        startBtn.setPrefWidth(180);
        startBtn.setPrefHeight(50);

        startBtn.setOnAction(e -> app.showLevelOne());

        root.getChildren().addAll(title, startBtn);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");
    }

    public Group getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.Group;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Group root = new Group();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = 960;
    private static final int HEIGHT = 672;

    private Image brick, coin, exit;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #      #  #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD IMAGES
        brick = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm());
        coin  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/coin.png").toExternalForm());
        exit  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/exit.png").toExternalForm());

        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#') gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                if (ch == 'C') gc.drawImage(coin, x, y, 32, 32);
                if (ch == 'E') gc.drawImage(exit, x, y, 48, 48);
            }
        }
    }

    public Group getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.application.Application;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;

public class Main extends Application {

    private Stage stage;
    public static final int WIDTH = 960;
    public static final int HEIGHT = 672;

    @Override
    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
        stage = primaryStage;
        stage.setTitle("Gravity Reverse");

        showSplash();
        stage.show();
    }

    public void showSplash() {
        SplashScreen splash = new SplashScreen(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(splash.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public void showLevelSelect() {
        LevelSelect select = new LevelSelect(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(select.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public void showLevelOne() {
        LevelOne level = new LevelOne(this);
        stage.setScene(new Scene(level.getRoot(), WIDTH, HEIGHT));
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        launch(args);
    }
}

}

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    private Image brick, coin, exit;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#   C        C   E#",
            "#   ######    ##  #",
            "#   #      P      #",
            "#####   ########  #",
            "#       #      #  #",
            "#   C   #   ####  #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD IMAGES
        brick = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm());
        coin  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/coin.png").toExternalForm());
        exit  = new Image(getClass().getResource("/assets/exit.png").toExternalForm());

        // GAME LOOP
        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                char ch = MAP[r].charAt(c);
                int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                int y = r * TILE_SIZE;

                if (ch == '#')
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);

                if (ch == 'C')
                    gc.drawImage(coin, x + 8, y + 8, 32, 32);

                if (ch == 'E')
                    gc.drawImage(exit, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
            }
        }
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.animation.AnimationTimer;
import javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas;
import javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext;
import javafx.scene.image.Image;
import javafx.scene.layout.Pane;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;

public class LevelOne {

    private Pane root = new Pane();

    private static final int TILE_SIZE = 48;
    private static final int WIDTH = Main.WIDTH;
    private static final int HEIGHT = Main.HEIGHT;

    private Image brick;

    private static final String[] MAP = {
            "####################",
            "#                  #",
            "#   ######         #",
            "#   #              #",
            "#####   ########   #",
            "#       #          #",
            "#       #   ####   #",
            "####################"
    };

    public LevelOne(Main app) {

        System.out.println("LEVEL ONE (BRICK) LOADED");

        root.setPrefSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #0b0616;");

        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
        GraphicsContext gc = canvas.getGraphicsContext2D();
        root.getChildren().add(canvas);

        // LOAD BRICK IMAGE
        brick = new Image(
                getClass().getResource("/assets/brick.png").toExternalForm()
        );

        new AnimationTimer() {
            @Override
            public void handle(long now) {
                draw(gc);
            }
        }.start();
    }

    private void draw(GraphicsContext gc) {

        // background
        gc.setFill(Color.web("#0b0616"));
        gc.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);

        // draw bricks
        for (int r = 0; r < MAP.length; r++) {
            for (int c = 0; c < MAP[r].length(); c++) {

                if (MAP[r].charAt(c) == '#') {
                    int x = c * TILE_SIZE;
                    int y = r * TILE_SIZE;
                    gc.drawImage(brick, x, y, TILE_SIZE, TILE_SIZE);
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public Pane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}

package org.example;

import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane;
import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
import javafx.scene.control.Button;
import javafx.scene.control.Label;
import javafx.scene.paint.Color;
import javafx.scene.text.Font;
import javafx.geometry.Pos;

public class LevelSelect {

    private StackPane root = new StackPane();

    public LevelSelect(Main app) {

        // ROOT SIZE + BG
        root.setPrefSize(Main.WIDTH, Main.HEIGHT);
        root.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #12091f;");
        root.setPickOnBounds(true); // ğŸ”¥ VERY IMPORTANT

        Label heading = new Label("SELECT LEVEL");
        heading.setTextFill(Color.WHITE);
        heading.setFont(Font.font("Verdana", 36));

        Button level1 = new Button("LEVEL 1");
        level1.setPrefSize(200, 60);
        level1.setFocusTraversable(false);

        // ğŸ”¥ HARD CLICK TEST
        level1.setOnMouseClicked(e -> {
            System.out.println("LEVEL 1 CLICKED");
            app.showLevelOne();
        });

        Button level2 = new Button("LEVEL 2");
        level2.setPrefSize(200, 60);
        level2.setDisable(true);

        VBox box = new VBox(30, heading, level1, level2);
        box.setAlignment(Pos.CENTER);

        root.getChildren().add(box);
    }

    public StackPane getRoot() {
        return root;
    }
}
âš ï¸ WHY THIS WORKS:

StackPane = safest clickable root

VBox = no overlap

setPickOnBounds(true) = mouse capture guaranteed

setOnMouseClicked = stronger than setOnAction
